title: Eradicator (GOG)
description:
Install instructions:
- Run "setup_eradicator_2.0.0.2.exe"
- Play
PLEASE REMEMBER TO SEED, MANY OTHERS WANT THIS! :)
If you like this game, support the developers and BUY IT!
Credits: this release was made possible by Swapware!

Title: ERADICATOR
Genre: Shooter - FPP - Sci-fi
Works on: Windows (XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10), Mac OS X (10.9+) and Linux (Ubuntu 14.04, Mint 17)
Languages: Audio and text: English
Features: single-player
Released: January 1, 1996
Size: 437.6 MB
Company: Accolade / Night Dive Studios
Rating:	ESRB Rating: Mature (with Animated Blood, Animated Violence)
Store page: http://www.gog.com/game/eradicator

About:
Explode into action!
A massive citadel sprawls upon an alien planet, the wealth of the galaxy held hostage beneath it's guns. You alone must enter the fortress and eliminate the hordes of destructive enemies and safeguard the future of mankind.
Take on the role of three different characters armed to the teeth with over 20 weapons and blast your way through the 25 puzzle filled levels.
3 distinct characters let you triple the hours of gameplay.
Choose between 1st- and 3rd-person player perspective to control better your character's movement, and to view enemies that sneak up from behind.
Defeat 20 different types of cunning enemies and bosses.
Enhance gameplay with unique picture-in-picture views that let you switch your views, control your weapons and enemies, and see two areas at once.

Minimum system requirements - Windows: XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10
Processor: 1.0 GHz
Memory: 512 MB RAM
Graphics: 100% DirectX compatible graphics
Storage: 1 GB available space
Sound Card: 100% DirectX compatible card or onboard sound

Recommended system requirements - Windows: Windows 7 / 8 / 10
Processor: 1.5 GHz
Memory: 1 GB RAM
Graphics: 100% DirectX compatible graphics
Storage: 1 GB available space
Sound Card: 100% DirectX compatible card or onboard sound
